mapper.select: select TRAINING_ID, COURSE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as time, LOCATION, TEACHER, URL, KNOWLEDGE_POINT,SUB_TOPIC,STATUS from t_training where NOW() < date_sub(TIME,interval 1 day) AND TRAINING_ID in (select TRAINING_ID FROM t_capability_training where CAPABILITY_ID = #{capabilityId}) AND TRAINING_ID NOT IN (select TRAINING_ID FROM t_personal_training WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId});
select * FROM t_training WHERE COURSE_NAME = #{trainingName} ORDER BY TIME DESC
SELECT DISTINCT COURSE_NAME as courseName FROM t_training ORDER BY COURSE_NAME ASC

SELECT TRAINING_ID as trainningId,COURSE_NAME as courseName,TIME as time,LOCATION as location,TEACHER as teacher,URL as url,KNOWLEDGE_POINT as knowledgePoint,SUB_TOPIC as SubTopic,STATUS as status FROM t_training WHERE TRAINING_ID = #{trainningId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_training set COURSE_NAME=#{courseName}, TIME=#{time}, LOCATION=#{location}, TEACHER=#{teacher}, URL=#{url}, KNOWLEDGE_POINT=#{knowledgePoint} WHERE TRAINING_ID = #{trainningId}

UPDATE T_TRAINING set STATUS = '1'
WHERE TRAINING_ID = #{trainningId} and STATUS = '0'
mapper.select: select point_title from t_knowledge_point where knowledge_point_id = #{pointId} and status = '0'
